pkgmetadata.longdescription: Paleoecology Functions for Regime Shift Analysis // Contains a variety of functions, based around regime shift analysis of paleoecological data. Citations: Rodionov() from Rodionov (2004) doi:10.1029/2004GL019448 Lanzante() from Lanzante (1996) doi:10.1002/(SICI)1097-0088(199611)16:11%3C1197::AID- JOC89%3E3.0.CO;2-L Hellinger_trans from Numerical Ecology, Legendre Legendre (ISBN 9780444538680) rolling_autoc from Liu, Gao Wang (2018) doi:10.1016/j.scitotenv.2018.06.276 Sample data sets lake_data lake_RSI processed from Bush, Silman Urrego (2004) doi:10.1126/science.1090795.
